provider.name: Joyne BE 3/3
provider.servicehacks:
# Write a CustomLCN file using data from the BAT on this transponder only. # This will be used to sort the services of all 3 transponders. try: not_assigned_if_first_loop except: not_assigned_if_first_loop = True custom_dir = os.path.dirname(__file__) + "/../custom" for type in ["video", "radio"]: xml_out_list = [] xml_out_list.append("<custom>
	<include>no</include>
	<lcnlist>
") for servicekey in logical_channel_number_dict.keys(): xml_out_list.append("		<configuration lcn="%d" channelnumber="%d" />
" % ( logical_channel_number_dict[servicekey]["logical_channel_number"], logical_channel_number_dict[servicekey]["service_id"], )) xml_out_list.append("	</lcnlist>
</custom>
") with open(custom_dir + "/hd_sat_0090_joyne_B_1_Custom" + ("radio" if type == "radio" else "") + "LCN.xml", "w", 0) as xmlout: xmlout.write(''.join(xml_out_list)) xmlout.close() del xml_out_list
# Clear LCN data. # We are going to add LCN data later for all three transponders using a CustomLCN file saved from the BAT on 11727 V service["number"] = service["service_id"] service["numbers"] = [service["service_id"]]
